```{r}
library(Hmisc)
library(tidyverse)
#library(urbnthemes)
#set_urbn_defaults(style = "print")

source(paste0(here::here(), "/RreadFEH/R/read_feh.R"))

first_year= 2006
last_year = 2040

years  = first_year:last_year
birth_years = 1980:2000
ages   = 16:40
grades = 12:16
sexes = c("All", "Men", "Women")

keep_cols = c(
  'PERNUM',
  'DOBY',
  'SEX',
  'ETHNCTY',
  'SCHOOLST',
  'YEARDIED', 
  paste0('GRADECAT', first_year:last_year),
  paste0('EARNINGS', first_year:last_year),
  paste0('WEDSTATE', first_year:last_year)
)

```

```{r}
#| context: data
#| cache: true
#| cache-vars: fehdf1

fehdf = bind_rows(
    mutate(fehdf0, dataset='FEH0'),
    mutate(fehdf1, dataset='FEH1'),
    mutate(fehdf2, dataset='FEH2')
    ) |>
    mutate(
        age = year-doby,
        sex = if_else(sex==1, "Men", "Women")
    ) |>
    filter(age>=16, gradecat>=12)

educByAgeYear = fehdf |> 
    filter(age %in% ages, year %in% years, gradecat %in% grades) |>
    count(age, year, gradecat, dataset) |>
    arrange(dataset, year, age, gradecat) |>
    group_by(dataset, year, age) |>
    mutate(cumn = cumsum(n))

educByAgeBCoh = fehdf |> 
    filter(age %in% ages, doby %in% birth_years, gradecat %in% grades) |>
    count(age, doby, gradecat, dataset) |>
    arrange(dataset, doby, age, gradecat) |>
    group_by(dataset, doby, age) |>
    mutate(cumn = cumsum(n))

```

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Age Profile by Year

```{r}
#| panel: sidebar

selectInput('year',  'Year',  years,  selected=years[2])
selectInput('grade1', 'Grade', grades, selected=grades[1])
selectInput('sex1', 'Sex', sexes, selected=sexes[1])
```


```{r}
#| panel: fill

plotOutput('plotByYear')
plotOutput('plotByYearGrade')
```

```{r}
#| context: server

library(ggplot2)

plotdf1 = reactive({ 
    dplyr::filter(
        educByAgeYear, 
        year==input$year, 
        gradecat==input$grade1
    ) 
})

plotdf1cum = reactive({ 
    dplyr::filter(
        educByAgeYear, 
        year==input$year
    ) |>
    dplyr::mutate(gradecat=factor(gradecat))
})

output$plotByYear = renderPlot({
    ggplot2::ggplot(plotdf1()) +
    ggplot2::geom_line(aes(x=age, y=n, linetype=dataset))
})

output$plotByYearGrade = renderPlot({
    ggplot2::ggplot(plotdf1cum()) +
    ggplot2::geom_line(aes(x=age, y=cumn, color=gradecat, linetype=dataset))
})

```
